ArgonTest.Name: Class override trait method
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
trait MyTrait <: Object
public virtual proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Hello' end
end
class MyClass <: MyTrait
public new() end
public override proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Moo' end end
proc main(): Unit do val obj: MyTrait = MyClass.new() obj.say_hello() end
